title: cryptokid980/homelab-2-prod-ai-golden-path
summary: This is a golden path (opinionated shortcut) to explore AI from local homelab to PROD using OSS for technological independence and local LLM for privacy. We explore concepts like AI agents, RAG and LLM using OSS technologies like Linux, Opentofu, microk8s, DAPR, Ollama, TimescaleDB & pgai Vectorizer, Flask and Python.

title: michaelalber/grounded-code-mcp
